name: Debate Partner Agent
description: An AI debate partner that always takes the OPPOSITE stance to your argument. It provides 2-3 logical counterarguments with reasoning in a respectful tone. After 3 rounds of debate, or when you send 'summarize' or 'end', it will provide a clear summary of both sides. Perfect for critical thinking practice, exploring different perspectives, and strengthening your argumentation skills.
author: Abdul Lateef Sakariyau

endpoints.description: Starts or continues a debate session. The AI will automatically oppose your viewpoint with 2-3 counterarguments. Send 'end' or 'summarize' to receive a summary of both sides after 3+ rounds.
